results.content: Great overview and detailed follow-along instructions for using elementor.  Good tips provided too.  Pacing is good, range of topics covered is excellent.  This is definitely aimed toward beginners and those not familiar with drag-and-drop editors.  For intermediate/advanced designers you'll want to skip through the videos since they really cover every detail from a beginner's perspective.  I didn't know about elementor and was buying other editors, so this course introduced me to something new and free!  Note: The description is accurate regarding NO CODING.  If you want to learn how to really customize CSS/JS etc. on WP, then this is not for you.  Overall, great course, I'm quite happy with my purchase.
results.content_html: Great overview and detailed follow-along instructions for using elementor. Good tips provided too. Pacing is good, range of topics covered is excellent. This is definitely aimed toward beginners and those not familiar with drag-and-drop editors. For intermediate/advanced designers you'll want to skip through the videos since they really cover every detail from a beginner's perspective. I didn't know about elementor and was buying other editors, so this course introduced me to something new and free! Note: The description is accurate regarding NO CODING. If you want to learn how to really customize CSS/JS etc. on WP, then this is not for you. Overall, great course, I'm quite happy with my purchase.

results.content:
A quite extensive course, many interesting aspects and I have learned some new things. Unfortunately, the short course has been summarized from several others, in many places you will find repetitions. Sometimes the pronunciation is also very fast, many "ok", "ok", "ok" in some videos. In addition there are the fast mouse movements and window changes in some videos. A complete revision with a continuous content book without repetition could do the course good. But what I liked very much is the good mixture of design, development and technology. Thanks, keep it up!
---
Ein recht umfangreicher Kurs, viele interessante Aspekt und ich habe einiges neues dazugelernt. Leider ist der Kurs aber aus mehren anderen zusammengefasst wurden, an vielen Stellen trifft man auf Wiederholungen. Teilweise ist die Aussprache auch sehr schnell, viele "ok", "ok", "ok" in so manchen Videos. Dazu kommt dann auch noch die schnellen Mausbewegungen und Fensterveränderungen in so manchen Videos. Eine komplette Überarbeitung mit einen fortlaufenden Inhalsbuch ohne Wiederholung könnte dem Kurs gut tun. Was mir aber sehr gut gefiel ist die gute Mischung aus Design, Entwicklung und Technik.Danke, weiter so!

results.content:
So I just finished the course as Im writing this review. Honestly, this course is great for any beginner with wordpress. It is clear and straight foward. The teacher is truly sharing his knowledge in web development and web designing. All the lesson are full of good insights to help you optimize your website as well as your overall design. There is no filter. He is just truly sharing value by providing us a Step-by-Step method to create a full website with Elementor ( The page builder used in the course ). He even go beyond that by sharing golden tips and insight for the overall optimization of our website through plugins, themes, websites, Add-on, SEO tools, and way more. 

If you wanna start Wordpress and are looking for ONE SINGLE COURSE, this one should definitely be on the top of your list. For context, before that course, I had another other one that I finished too.... and that one wasn't even close in terms of value and knowledge that I got from it compare to Kahlil course!

Dont sleep on that one...

N.B : However, I do gotta mention that the teacher has a little accent. Personally for me, I was a getting a little annoying at first. But in all honesty, it think this is a detail that should stop you from getting the core value from this course.
